entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain mixed with snow. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain or snow. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 23 April 2023
